title: [Dynamic Regions] stale read is not working in raftstore v2
body:
## Bug Report

Stale read is not working in raftstore v2

### What version of TiKV are you using?
<!-- You can run `tikv-server --version` -->

v7.0.0

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

Enable raftstore v2 and run stale raed SQL in tidb.

### What did you expect?

Stale read success.

### What did happened?

Stale read fails.
